::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod sees the newcomers attack again.
"We finish this later." He says to Savanna.
He then turns towards the newcomers.
"You guy's should have retreated, when you had the chance!"
He the fires 2 plasma charges each, at Ares, Anubis, Sixshot, and he
fires two rockets at Koga.
"Now, you're SLAG!"
